flawed_nl_solution:
He estimates the building on the left is 80 feet tall because 100 x 0.8 = <<100*0.8=80>>80
The combined height of the left and middle is 810 because 100 + 80 = <<100+80=810>>810
The building on the right he estimates as 790 feet because 810 - 20 = <<810-20=790>>790
He estimates the combined height as 970 feet because 80 + 100 + 790 = <<80+100+790=970>>970
#### 970

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 810. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
